misc: Originally known to many Hector players from his past appearances in Finnkampen events
biography: Jari, a name familiar to many Hector Trophée enthusiasts through his past participation in Finnkampen events, is a golfer of considerable talent and, by most accounts, a rather affable character. Representing Archipelagia Golf Club, Jari's journey in the sport is marked by a dedication that those around him find inspiring.

While Jari is considered as retired from Hector events, the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Jari's inaugural appearance in the tournament. It will be interesting to see how Jari's prior experience will influence his performance in the upcoming event.
